Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

Outline: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

Name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, George Carlin
Outline: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

Name: The Rescuers
Credit: Dir: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman With: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, Geraldine Page
Outline: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

Name: Bolt
Credit: Dir: Byron Howard, Chris Williams With: John Travolta, Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman
Outline: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

Name: You Only Live Twice
Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama
Outline: Agent 007 and the Japanese secret service ninja force must find and stop the true culprit of a series of spacejackings before nuclear war is provoked.

Name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Kevin Costner, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Outline: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

Name: Rob Roy
Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Liam Neeson, Jessica Lange, John Hurt
Outline: In the highlands of Scotland in the 1700s, Rob Roy tries to lead his small town to a better future,...

Name: The Edge
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Anthony Hopkins, Alec Baldwin, Elle Macpherson
Outline: An intellectual billionaire and two lesser men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

Name: Peter Pan
Credit: Dir: P.J. Hogan With: Jeremy Sumpter, Jason Isaacs, Olivia Williams
Outline: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

Name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
Credit: Dir: Duwayne Dunham With: Michael J. Fox, Sally Field, Don Alder
Outline: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

Name: Conan the Barbarian
Credit: Dir: John Milius With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Earl Jones, Max von Sydow
Outline: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his tribe and his parents whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his warriors when he was a boy.

Name: Meet the Robinsons
Credit: Dir: Stephen J. Anderson With: Daniel Hansen, Wesley Singerman, Angela Bassett
Outline: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

Name: All Is Lost
Credit: Dir: J.C. Chandor With: Robert Redford
Outline: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

Name: A Knight's Tale
Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Heath Ledger, Mark Addy, Rufus Sewell
Outline: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

Name: Cool Runnings
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: John Candy, Leon, Doug E. Doug
Outline: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified to the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
Credit: Dir: Andrew Adamson With: Tilda Swinton, Georgie Henley, William Moseley
Outline: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

Name: Horton Hears a Who!
Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward, Steve Martino With: Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett
Outline: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

Name: The Rescuers Down Under
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Hendel Butoy, Mike Gabriel With: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, John Candy
Outline: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

Name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Ty Burrell, Max Charles, Stephen Colbert
Outline: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

Name: The Road to El Dorado
Credit: Dir: Bibo Bergeron, Don Paul With: Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez
Outline: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

Name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary
Outline: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

Name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
Credit: Dir: Ken Hughes With: Dick Van Dyke, Sally Ann Howes, Lionel Jeffries
Outline: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

Name: Flight of the Navigator
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: Joey Cramer, Paul Reubens, Cliff De Young
Outline: In 1978, a boy is moved 8 years into the future and has an adventure with the alien ship that is responsible for that.

Name: Mission: Impossible III
Credit: Dir: J.J. Abrams With: Tom Cruise, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames
Outline: Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fianceÃ© in response .

Name: Spectre
Credit: Dir: Sam Mendes With: Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, LÃ©a Seydoux
Outline: A cryptic message from Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.

Name: Enemy Mine
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Dennis Quaid, Louis Gossett Jr., Brion James
Outline: A soldier from Earth crash-lands on an alien world after sustaining battle damage. Eventually he encounters another survivor...

Name: Jumanji
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst, Bonnie Hunt
Outline: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

Name: Clash of the Titans
Credit: Dir: Desmond Davis With: Laurence Olivier, Harry Hamlin, Claire Bloom
Outline: A film adaption of the myth of Perseus and his quest to battle both Medusa and the Kraken monster to save the Princess Andromeda.

Name: The Island
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Scarlett Johansson, Ewan McGregor, Djimon Hounsou
Outline: Lincoln Six Echo is just like everyone else - he's waiting to go to the Island, the only place left in the world to actually live a life...

Name: National Treasure
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Justin Bartha
Outline: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

Name: The Book of Eli
Credit: Dir: Albert Hughes, Allen Hughes With: Denzel Washington, Mila Kunis, Ray Stevenson
Outline: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

Name: The Brothers Bloom
Credit: Dir: Rian Johnson With: Rachel Weisz, Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo
Outline: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Christopher Plummer, Lily Cole, Heath Ledger
Outline: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

Name: Adventures in Babysitting
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Elisabeth Shue, Maia Brewton, Keith Coogan
Outline: A babysitter must leave her safe suburban surroundings and head for the heart of the big city to rescue a stranded friend, unaware of the perilous adventures that await her and the kids she's looking after who have tagged along.

Name: The Guardian
Credit: Dir: Andrew Davis With: Kevin Costner, Ashton Kutcher, Sela Ward
Outline: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

Name: Captain America: The First Avenger
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Samuel L. Jackson
Outline: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

Name: Logan's Run
Credit: Dir: Michael Anderson With: Michael York, Jenny Agutter, Richard Jordan
Outline: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at the age of 30.

Name: The Incredible Hulk
Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth
Outline: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.

Name: Live and Let Die
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour
Outline: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

Name: The Good Dinosaur
Credit: Dir: Peter Sohn With: Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Maleah Nipay-Padilla
Outline: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

Name: TRON
Credit: Dir: Steven Lisberger With: Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner
Outline: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

Name: The Boxtrolls
Credit: Dir: Graham Annable, Anthony Stacchi With: Ben Kingsley, Jared Harris, Nick Frost
Outline: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

Name: Who Am I?
Credit: Dir: Benny Chan, Jackie Chan With: Jackie Chan, Michelle Ferre, Mirai Yamamoto
Outline: A secret agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by a number of other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

Name: The Ghost and the Darkness
Credit: Dir: Stephen Hopkins With: Michael Douglas, Val Kilmer, Tom Wilkinson
Outline: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

Name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
Credit: Dir: Liam Lynch With: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, JR Reed
Outline: In Venice Beach, naive Midwesterner JB bonds with local slacker KG and they form the rock band Tenacious D. Setting out to become the world's greatest band is no easy feat, so they set out to steal what could be the answer to their prayers -- a magical guitar pick housed in a rock-and-roll museum some 300 miles away.

Name: TRON: Legacy
Credit: Dir: Joseph Kosinski With: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde
Outline: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

Name: The A-Team
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley
Outline: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

Name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Credit: Dir: Brad Silberling With: Jim Carrey, Jude Law, Meryl Streep
Outline: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Michael J. Fox, Jim Varney, Corey Burton
Outline: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

Name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
Credit: Dir: Peter R. Hunt With: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas
Outline: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

Name: For Your Eyes Only
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol
Outline: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

Name: Where the Wild Things Are
Credit: Dir: Spike Jonze With: Max Records, Catherine O'Hara, Forest Whitaker
Outline: Yearning for escape and adventure, a young boy runs away from home and sails to an island filled with creatures that take him in as their king.

Name: The Grey
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo
Outline: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

Name: Over the Hedge
Credit: Dir: Tim Johnson, Karey Kirkpatrick With: Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling, Steve Carell
Outline: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

Name: A Goofy Movie
Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Bill Farmer, Jason Marsden, Jim Cummings
Outline: When Max makes an preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

Name: The Man with the Golden Gun
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland
Outline: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Credit: Dir: Marc Webb With: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx
Outline: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Name: X-Men: The Last Stand
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
Outline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

Name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
Credit: Dir: Mike Judge, Mike de Seve With: Mike Judge, Bruce Willis, Demi Moore
Outline: The dimwitted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

Name: The Hunter
Credit: Dir: Daniel Nettheim With: Willem Dafoe, Sam Neill, Morgana Davies
Outline: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.

Name: Brother Bear
Credit: Dir: Aaron Blaise, Robert Walker With: Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Suarez, Rick Moranis
Outline: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

Name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Credit: Dir: Garth Jennings With: Martin Freeman, Yasiin Bey, Sam Rockwell
Outline: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

Name: Divergent
Credit: Dir: Neil Burger With: Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Kate Winslet
Outline: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

Name: Innerspace
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan
Outline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

Name: The Mask of Zorro
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Romance | Thriller | Western
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Anthony Hopkins, Catherine Zeta-Jones
Outline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

Name: Penguins of Madagascar
Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Simon J. Smith With: Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Christopher Knights
Outline: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Credit: Dir: Steve Barron With: Judith Hoag, Elias Koteas, Josh Pais
Outline: A group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.

Name: James and the Giant Peach
Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Paul Terry, Joanna Lumley, Pete Postlethwaite
Outline: An orphan with terrible aunts for guardians, befriends human like bugs who live inside a giant peach, who take the boy on a journey to New York City.

Name: The Wolverine
Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto
Outline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Name: Oliver & Company
Credit: Dir: George Scribner With: Joey Lawrence, Billy Joel, Cheech Marin
Outline: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York.

Name: Nothing to Lose
Credit: Dir: Steve Oedekerk With: Martin Lawrence, Tim Robbins, John C. McGinley
Outline: Nick Beam's life couldn't get any worse. He discovers he has been living a lie and is on the verge of a nervous breakdown...

Name: The Living Daylights
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen KrabbÃ©
Outline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

Name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer
Outline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

Name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
Credit: Dir: Mel Brooks With: Cary Elwes, Richard Lewis, Roger Rees
Outline: A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves in particular.

Name: The Last Starfighter
Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Lance Guest, Robert Preston, Kay E. Kuter
Outline: A discouraged video-gaming boy finds himself recruited as a gunner for an alien defense force.

Name: The Rundown
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken
Outline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds
Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

Name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
Credit: Dir: Lorene Scafaria With: Steve Carell, Keira Knightley, Melanie Lynskey
Outline: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

Name: Epic
Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge With: Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, BeyoncÃ© Knowles
Outline: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group of characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

Name: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
Credit: Dir: Peter Lord, Jeff Newitt With: Hugh Grant, Salma Hayek, Jeremy Piven
Outline: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

Name: The Bourne Legacy
Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton
Outline: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

Name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, David Kelly
Outline: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

Name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor
Outline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with PadmÃ©, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

Name: Diamonds Are Forever
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray
Outline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

Name: Puss in Boots
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
Credit: Dir: Chris Miller With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis
Outline: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.

Name: Robin Hood
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett, Matthew Macfadyen
Outline: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

Name: Hook
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Dustin Hoffman, Robin Williams, Julia Roberts
Outline: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
Credit: Dir: Francis Lawrence With: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
Outline: As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

Name: Home
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Tim Johnson With: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin
Outline: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

Name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Romance
Credit: Dir: Patrick Gilmore, Tim Johnson With: Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Joseph Fiennes
Outline: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Johnny Depp, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Ian McShane
Outline: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

Name: The Expendables 2
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture
Outline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

Name: Flushed Away
Credit: Dir: David Bowers, Sam Fell With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Ian McKellen
Outline: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

Name: Quantum of Solace
Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric
Outline: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organization from eliminating a country's most valuable resource. All the while, he still tries to seek revenge over the death of his love.

Name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
Credit: Dir: Steve Martino, Mike Thurmeier With: Ray Romano, Denis Leary, John Leguizamo
Outline: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

Name: Hidalgo
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Viggo Mortensen, Omar Sharif, Zuleikha Robinson
Outline: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

Name: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Credit: Dir: Jon Hurwitz, Hayden Schlossberg With: John Cho, Kal Penn, Neil Patrick Harris
Outline: Follows the cross-country adventures of the pot-smoking duo as they try to outrun authorities who suspect them of being terrorists when they try to sneak a bong on board their flight to Amsterdam.

Name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Credit: Dir: Leonard Nimoy With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

Name: Wyatt Earp
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Kevin Costner, Dennis Quaid, Gene Hackman
Outline: Wyatt Earp is a movie about a man and his family. The movie shows us the good times and the bad times of one of the West's most famous individuals.

Name: Pocahontas
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | History | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Mike Gabriel, Eric Goldberg With: Mel Gibson, Linda Hunt, Christian Bale
Outline: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

Name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Credit: Dir: Jay Roach With: Mike Myers, Heather Graham, Michael York
Outline: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Name: Armageddon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck
Outline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

Name: The Forbidden Kingdom
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Jackie Chan, Jet Li, Michael Angarano
Outline: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Credit: Dir: Mike Newell With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton, Ben Kingsley
Outline: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Name: The Beach
Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon
Outline: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

Name: Fanboys
Credit: Dir: Kyle Newman With: Dan Fogler, Jay Baruchel, Kristen Bell
Outline: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas ' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace before its release.

Name: Australia
Credit: Dir: Baz Luhrmann With: Nicole Kidman, Hugh Jackman, Shea Adams
Outline: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

Name: Licence to Kill
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Robert Davi, Carey Lowell
Outline: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

Name: John Carter
Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton With: Taylor Kitsch, Lynn Collins, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

Name: Titan A.E.
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Matt Damon, Drew Barrymore, Bill Pullman
Outline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Name: Dune
Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Kyle MacLachlan, Virginia Madsen, Francesca Annis
Outline: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

Name: The Polar Express
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter
Outline: A young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express. During his adventure he learns about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Black Death
Genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | History | Horror | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Christopher Smith With: Eddie Redmayne, Sean Bean, Carice van Houten
Outline: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

Name: Rat Race
Credit: Dir: Jerry Zucker With: Breckin Meyer, Amy Smart, Whoopi Goldberg
Outline: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

Name: Star Trek: Insurrection
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
Outline: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

Name: Night at the Museum
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais
Outline: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

Name: The Rocketeer
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Billy Campbell, Jennifer Connelly, Alan Arkin
Outline: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

Name: Executive Decision
Credit: Dir: Stuart Baird With: Kurt Russell, Halle Berry, Steven Seagal
Outline: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

Name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Credit: Dir: Robert Wise With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

Name: The World Is Not Enough
Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle
Outline: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Name: Centurion
Genre: Action | Adventure | Drama | History | Thriller | War
Credit: Dir: Neil Marshall With: Michael Fassbender, Dominic West, Olga Kurylenko
Outline: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is decimated in a devastating guerrilla attack.

Name: The Perfect Storm
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Diane Lane
Outline: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Name: Goosebumps
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush
Outline: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

Name: Cliffhanger
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow, Michael Rooker
Outline: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

Name: Rio 2
Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, Jemaine Clement
Outline: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

Name: Shrek Forever After
Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
Outline: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

Name: Oz the Great and Powerful
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: James Franco, Michelle Williams, Rachel Weisz
Outline: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

Name: Spies Like Us
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd, Steve Forrest
Outline: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

Name: The Three Musketeers
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Charlie Sheen, Kiefer Sutherland, Chris O'Donnell
Outline: The three best of the disbanded Musketeers - Athos, Porthos, and Aramis - join a young hotheaded would-be-Musketeer...

Name: Robots
Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha With: Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Mel Brooks
Outline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

Name: A View to a Kill
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Tanya Roberts
Outline: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Ben Barnes, Skandar Keynes, Georgie Henley
Outline: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

Name: The Jackal
Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Bruce Willis, Richard Gere, Sidney Poitier
Outline: An imprisoned IRA sniper is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

Name: Weekend at Bernie's
Credit: Dir: Ted Kotcheff With: Andrew McCarthy, Jonathan Silverman, Catherine Mary Stewart
Outline: Two losers try to pretend that their assassinated employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

Name: The Mummy Returns
Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah
Outline: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

Name: A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas
Credit: Dir: Todd Strauss-Schulson With: Kal Penn, John Cho, Neil Patrick Harris
Outline: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

Name: TMNT
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Kevin Munroe With: Patrick Stewart, Mako, Chris Evans
Outline: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

Name: The River Wild
Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn
Outline: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

Name: Insurgent
Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Theo James
Outline: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

Name: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
Credit: Dir: Steve Oedekerk With: Jim Carrey, Ian McNeice, Simon Callow
Outline: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

Name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Shia LaBeouf, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Tyrese Gibson
Outline: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

Name: King Arthur
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Clive Owen, Stephen Dillane, Keira Knightley
Outline: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Name: Cars 2
Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Brad Lewis With: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine
Outline: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

Name: Johnny English Reborn
Credit: Dir: Oliver Parker With: Rowan Atkinson, Rosamund Pike, Dominic West
Outline: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down the Chinese premier.

Name: Jack the Giant Slayer
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Nicholas Hoult, Stanley Tucci, Ewan McGregor
Outline: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

Name: Total Recall
Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Colin Farrell, Bokeem Woodbine, Bryan Cranston
Outline: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

Name: Space Jam
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

Name: Twister
Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes
Outline: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

Name: Outlander
Credit: Dir: Howard McCain With: Jim Caviezel, Sophia Myles, Ron Perlman
Outline: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

Name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Rick Moranis, Matt Frewer, Marcia Strassman
Outline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

Name: 47 Ronin
Credit: Dir: Carl Rinsch With: Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Ko Shibasaki
Outline: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

Name: Moonraker
Credit: Dir: Lewis Gilbert With: Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale
Outline: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Name: Beowulf
Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Ray Winstone, Crispin Glover, Angelina Jolie
Outline: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing Denmark, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

Name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Robin Williams, Owen Wilson
Outline: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it is gone forever.

Name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
Credit: Dir: George Miller, George Ogilvie With: Mel Gibson, Tina Turner, Bruce Spence
Outline: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

Name: The Eagle
Credit: Dir: Kevin Macdonald With: Channing Tatum, Jamie Bell, Donald Sutherland
Outline: In Roman-ruled Britain, a young Roman soldier endeavors to honor his father's memory by finding his lost legion's golden emblem.

Name: Shanghai Knights
Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Fann Wong
Outline: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

Name: Tomorrow, When the War Began
Credit: Dir: Stuart Beattie With: Caitlin Stasey, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Lincoln Lewis
Outline: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely high school teenagers band together to fight.

Name: Last Action Hero
Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, F. Murray Abraham, Art Carney
Outline: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.

Name: Spider-Man 3
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Topher Grace
Outline: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

Name: Sky High
Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Kurt Russell, Kelly Preston, Michael Angarano
Outline: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

Name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf
Outline: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

Name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, William Sadler
Outline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

Name: Never Say Never Again
Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Sean Connery, Kim Basinger, Klaus Maria Brandauer
Outline: A SPECTRE agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

Name: Reign of Fire
Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Matthew McConaughey, Christian Bale, Izabella Scorupco
Outline: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

Name: Last Knights
Credit: Dir: Kazuaki Kiriya With: Clive Owen, Morgan Freeman, Aksel Hennie
Outline: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.

Name: Open Season
Credit: Dir: Roger Allers, Jill Culton With: Ashton Kutcher, Martin Lawrence, Debra Messing
Outline: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

Name: The Saint
Credit: Dir: Phillip Noyce With: Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Serbedzija
Outline: Simon Templar has no real family, no real home and Simon Templar isn't even his real name. Yet Simon Templar...

Name: Vacation
Credit: Dir: John Francis Daley, Jonathan M. Goldstein With: Ed Helms, Christina Applegate, Skyler Gisondo
Outline: Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.

Name: Bee Movie
Credit: Dir: Steve Hickner, Simon J. Smith With: Jerry Seinfeld, RenÃ©e Zellweger, Matthew Broderick
Outline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

Name: Ironclad
Credit: Dir: Jonathan English With: Paul Giamatti, Jason Flemyng, Brian Cox
Outline: In 13th-century England, a small group of Knights Templar fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.

Name: The Tale of Despereaux
Credit: Dir: Sam Fell, Robert Stevenhagen With: Matthew Broderick, Emma Watson, Dustin Hoffman
Outline: The tale of three unlikely heroes - a misfit mouse who prefers reading books to eating them, an unhappy rat who schemes to leave the darkness of the dungeon, and a bumbling servant girl with cauliflower ears - whose fates are intertwined with that of the castle's princess.

Name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Nicolas Cage, Jay Baruchel, Alfred Molina
Outline: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.

Name: Inkheart
Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Brendan Fraser, Andy Serkis, Eliza Bennett
Outline: A young girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

Name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Dax Shepard
Outline: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

Name: The Expendables 3
Credit: Dir: Patrick Hughes With: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li
Outline: Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.

Name: Snow White and the Huntsman
Credit: Dir: Rupert Sanders With: Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron
Outline: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

Name: The Golden Compass
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Dakota Blue Richards
Outline: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Name: Planet 51
Credit: Dir: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Jessica Biel
Outline: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

Name: I Am Number Four
Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Alex Pettyfer, Timothy Olyphant, Dianna Agron
Outline: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

Name: Johnny English
Credit: Dir: Peter Howitt With: Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia
Outline: After a sudden attack on the MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.

Name: Die Another Day
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Rosamund Pike
Outline: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

Name: San Andreas
Credit: Dir: Brad Peyton With: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario
Outline: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

Name: Small Soldiers
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Kirsten Dunst, Gregory Smith, David Cross
Outline: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

Name: Waterworld
Credit: Dir: Kevin Reynolds With: Kevin Costner, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Dennis Hopper
Outline: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

Name: Superman Returns
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth
Outline: Superman reappears after a long absence, but is challenged by an old foe who uses Kryptonian technology for world domination.

Name: Flight of the Phoenix
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Dennis Quaid, Miranda Otto, Giovanni Ribisi
Outline: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

Name: Men in Black II
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Rip Torn
Outline: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

Name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Ted Post With: James Franciscus, Kim Hunter, Maurice Evans
Outline: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

Name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
Credit: Dir: Kerry Conran With: Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Angelina Jolie
Outline: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

Name: On the Road
Credit: Dir: Walter Salles With: Sam Riley, Garrett Hedlund, Kristen Stewart
Outline: Young writer Sal Paradise has his life shaken by the arrival of free-spirited Dean Moriarty and his girl, Marylou. As they travel across the country, they encounter a mix of people who each impact their journey indelibly.

Name: The Mexican
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini
Outline: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

Name: Jumper
Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Hayden Christensen, Samuel L. Jackson, Jamie Bell
Outline: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

Name: Transporter 3
Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova
Outline: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.

Name: Solomon Kane
Credit: Dir: Michael J. Bassett With: James Purefoy, Max von Sydow, Rachel Hurd-Wood
Outline: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

Name: Exodus: Gods and Kings
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Christian Bale, Joel Edgerton, Ben Kingsley
Outline: The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 600,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

Name: The Jewel of the Nile
Credit: Dir: Lewis Teague With: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito
Outline: This is the sequel to "Romancing the Stone" where Jack and Joan have their yacht and easy life, but...

Name: Mission: Impossible II
Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton
Outline: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

Name: Shrek the Third
Credit: Dir: Chris Miller, Raman Hui With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
Outline: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

Name: Hercules
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Dwayne Johnson, John Hurt, Ian McShane
Outline: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Credit: Dir: Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell With: Tom Kenny, Antonio Banderas, Bill Fagerbakke
Outline: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Name: Van Helsing
Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh
Outline: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

Name: Nim's Island
Credit: Dir: Jennifer Flackett, Mark Levin With: Jodie Foster, Gerard Butler, Abigail Breslin
Outline: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel
Outline: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

Name: Arthur and the Invisibles
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Freddie Highmore, Mia Farrow, Madonna
Outline: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Name: Valhalla Rising
Credit: Dir: Nicolas Winding Refn With: Mads Mikkelsen, Maarten Stevenson, Alexander Morton
Outline: 1000 AD, for years, One Eye, a mute warrior of supernatural strength, has been held prisoner by the Norse chieftain Barde...

Name: Sahara
Credit: Dir: Breck Eisner With: Matthew McConaughey, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Steve Zahn
Outline: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

Name: Shark Tale
Credit: Dir: Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson With: Will Smith, Robert De Niro, RenÃ©e Zellweger
Outline: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

Name: Deep Rising
Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Treat Williams, Famke Janssen, Anthony Heald
Outline: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who have taken over the ship first.

Name: The Last Witch Hunter
Credit: Dir: Breck Eisner With: Vin Diesel, Rose Leslie, Elijah Wood
Outline: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

Name: Cannibal Holocaust
Credit: Dir: Ruggero Deodato With: Robert Kerman, Francesca Ciardi, Perry Pirkanen
Outline: During a rescue mission into the amazon rain forest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
Credit: Dir: Michael Pressman With: Paige Turco, David Warner, Michelan Sisti
Outline: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last cannister of the ooze that created the Turtles, which Shredder wants to create an army of new mutants.

Name: Into the Woods
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Anna Kendrick, Meryl Streep, Chris Pine
Outline: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

Name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
Credit: Dir: Paul Weitz With: Chris Massoglia, John C. Reilly, Salma Hayek
Outline: Teenager, Darren Shan, meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a Vampire. After a series of events Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque Du Freak and become a Vampire.

Name: The Postman
Credit: Dir: Kevin Costner With: Kevin Costner, Will Patton, Larenz Tate
Outline: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

Name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian

Name: The Dukes of Hazzard
Credit: Dir: Jay Chandrasekhar With: Seann William Scott, Johnny Knoxville, Jessica Simpson
Outline: Cousins Bo and Luke Duke, with a little help from their cousin Daisy and Uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.

Name: Agent Cody Banks
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Crime | Family | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Andrew Francis
Outline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Name: Stealth
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel, Jamie Foxx
Outline: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

Name: Congo
Credit: Dir: Frank Marshall With: Laura Linney, Tim Curry, Dylan Walsh
Outline: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

Name: Toys
Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack
Outline: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

Name: Red Sonja
Credit: Dir: Richard Fleischer With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Brigitte Nielsen, Sandahl Bergman
Outline: A vengeful woman sets out to retrieve a magic orb from an evil queen whom she vows vengeance upon after the evil queen slain her family and her loyal warriors raped her.

Name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard
Outline: Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

Name: Meet Dave
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union
Outline: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Name: Scooby-Doo
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar
Outline: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
Credit: Dir: David Slade With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

Name: After Earth
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Jaden Smith, David Denman, Will Smith
Outline: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

Name: Year One
Credit: Dir: Harold Ramis With: Jack Black, Michael Cera, Olivia Wilde
Outline: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

Name: Gulliver's Travels
Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel
Outline: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Liliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

Name: The Phantom
Credit: Dir: Simon Wincer With: Billy Zane, Kristy Swanson, Treat Williams
Outline: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

Name: 102 Dalmatians
Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Glenn Close, GÃ©rard Depardieu, Ioan Gruffudd
Outline: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after them darned puppies once more.

Name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
Credit: Dir: McG With: Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Cameron Diaz
Outline: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

Name: DOA: Dead or Alive
Credit: Dir: Corey Yuen With: Jaime Pressly, Devon Aoki, Sarah Carter
Outline: The movie adaptation of the best selling video game series Dead or Alive.

Name: Ra.One
Credit: Dir: Anubhav Sinha With: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor
Outline: A video game developer's world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation becomes all too real.

Name: Black Knight
Credit: Dir: Gil Junger With: Martin Lawrence, Marsha Thomason, Tom Wilkinson
Outline: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance | Sport
Credit: Dir: Angela Robinson With: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Cheryl Hines
Outline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

Name: Honey I Blew Up the Kid
Credit: Dir: Randal Kleiser With: Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman, Robert Oliveri
Outline: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Name: Anaconda
Credit: Dir: Luis Llosa With: Jon Voight, Jennifer Lopez, Eric Stoltz
Outline: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

Name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
Outline: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship- this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

Name: Howard the Duck
Credit: Dir: Willard Huyck With: Lea Thompson, Jeffrey Jones, Tim Robbins
Outline: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.

Name: Fantastic Four
Credit: Dir: Josh Trank With: Miles Teller, Kate Mara, Michael B. Jordan
Outline: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

Name: xXx: State of the Union
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Ice Cube, Samuel L. Jackson, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

Name: The Last Airbender
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
Outline: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

Name: The Legend of Hercules
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Kellan Lutz, Gaia Weiss, Scott Adkins
Outline: The origin story of the the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

Name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Daryl Sabara, Alexa PenaVega, Antonio Banderas
Outline: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Name: Inspector Gadget
Credit: Dir: David Kellogg With: Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett, Joely Fisher
Outline: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen
Outline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

Name: Super Mario Bros.
Credit: Dir: Annabel Jankel, Rocky Morton With: Bob Hoskins, John Leguizamo, Dennis Hopper
Outline: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

Name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
Credit: Dir: Joe Berlinger With: Jeffrey Donovan, Stephen Barker Turner, Erica Leerhsen
Outline: A group of tourists arrive in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing "The Blair Witch Project" to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

Name: The Cat in the Hat
Credit: Dir: Bo Welch With: Mike Myers, Spencer Breslin, Dakota Fanning
Outline: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

Name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Jason Statham, Ron Perlman, Ray Liotta
Outline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

Name: Street Fighter
Credit: Dir: Steven E. de Souza With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Ming-Na Wen
Outline: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

Name: The Avengers
Credit: Dir: Jeremiah S. Chechik With: Ralph Fiennes, Uma Thurman, Sean Connery
Outline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

Name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Robin Shou, Talisa Soto, James Remar
Outline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

Name: Dungeons & Dragons
Credit: Dir: Courtney Solomon With: Justin Whalin, Jeremy Irons, Zoe McLellan
Outline: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Credit: Dir: Sidney J. Furie With: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder
Outline: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Name: BloodRayne
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Kristanna Loken, Ben Kingsley, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: In the 18th century, a vampire escapes from the freak show she once participated in and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

Name: Dragonball: Evolution
Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow
Outline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

Name: Battlefield Earth
Credit: Dir: Roger Christian With: John Travolta, Forest Whitaker, Barry Pepper
Outline: After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

Name: Epic Movie
Credit: Dir: Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer With: Kal Penn, Jennifer Coolidge, Fred Willard
Outline: A comedic satire of films that are large in scope, reputation and popularity

Name: House of the Dead
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Jonathan Cherry, Tyron Leitso, Clint Howard
Outline: A group of college students travel to a mysterious island to attend a rave, and end up getting trapped there because it's been taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.
